formatDescription: FCPXML files are XML-based files used by Apple's Final Cut Pro to describe project data, enabling users to transfer projects, projects, and metadata between Final Cut Pro and other compatible applications. They contain information about media, clips, editing decisions, and other project assets.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: FCPXML Interchange Format
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: <?xml version=("|')1.0("|'){0-128}fcpxml
